intro:
Welcome to ZIKYinc Tools

Explore a collection of powerful, community-driven applications designed to streamline your creative workflow. From handy web utilities for artists and designers to robust Windows applications for musicians and developers, our tools are built to help you create without limits.

Each tool is a product of collaboration and innovation from within the ZIKYinc ecosystem. Dive in, discover something new, and let us know what you think!

web.name: QR Gem
web.summary: Internal QR Code generator for professional creative assets and high-speed links.

web.name: Chroma Palette
web.summary: Instantly generate beautiful, accessible color palettes for your design projects.

win.name: WaveForm Converter
win.summary: A lightweight, powerful tool to convert, trim, and apply effects to audio files.

scripts.name: Scripting Toolkit
scripts.summary: Automation and helper scripts for Python, PowerShell, and AutoHotkey users.

py.name: Asset Bulk Renamer
py.summary: A fast script for batch renaming game assets with custom prefix/suffix rules.

ps.name: Dev-Environment Setup
ps.summary: Automates the installation of dev tools on fresh Windows installs.

ahk.name: Universal Hotkey Manager
ahk.summary: Map complex application workflows to simple key combinations.

ai.name: AI & Prompt Lab
ai.summary: Tools and frameworks for integrating AI into the creative process.

apps.name: Prompt Engineering Lab
apps.summary: Visual sandbox for testing and refining Gemini and Midjourney prompts.

prompts.name: Artist Prompt Pack v1
prompts.summary: A curated collection of high-impact prompts for stable diffusion and beyond.
